title: invalid username and password stuff
body: ok so i am on a smurf account because I cannot access my actual account. so just randomly I was told that my username or password is incorrect please try again. well the thing is I have never changed my username or password. i tried going to the forgot password and forgot username links and when I put in any of my information it doesnt  get sent to my email. so I am stuck in a rut and I submitted a ticket but I thought i would ask the community anyway. i purchased alot of stuff on that account and would like it not to go away. btw my original is BIONICxXSTELTH

replies.body: I went ahead and looked into your account to see what might be going on, and it actually looks like someone else might have weaseled their way onto your account without you knowing it! I'd hit up our account team as soon as you can using their [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) in order to get it back under your control!
